title: Renal function in resistance-trained individuals using creatine

sections.abstract: Concerns about kidney health remain a barrier to creatine use. This study monitored renal markers in resistance-trained adults supplementing with creatine for 12 months...
sections.introduction: Case reports have raised questions about whether creatine could stress renal function, particularly in individuals with high protein intake...
sections.results: Serum creatinine increased slightly as expected, but estimated GFR and other kidney markers remained within normal limits and were not different from controls...
sections.conclusion: In healthy resistance-trained adults, one year of creatine supplementation did not adversely affect kidney function...
